#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,x,y,z,a,b,i,j,flage=0;
        long price;
        cin>>n>>x>>y>>z;
        price=1000*x+100*y+10*z;
        for(i=9;i>=1;i--)
        {
            for(j=9;j>=0;j--)
            {
                if((10000*i+price+j)%n==0)
                {
                    flage=1;
                    a=i;b=j;
                    break;
                }
            }
            if(flage==1)
            break;
        }
        if(flage==1)
            cout<<a<<" "<<b<<" "<<(10000*i+price+j)/n<<endl;
        else
            cout<<"0"<<endl;
    }
 return 0;
}
